snippet: Beginning on Mar. 21, 13 of Ms. Blume's books, including "Are You There God? It's Me, Margaret," "Blubber" and "Starring Sally J. Freedman as Herself," will go on sale.
abstract: Beginning on Mar. 21, 13 of Ms. Blume's books, including "Are You There God? It's Me, Margaret," "Blubber" and "Starring Sally J. Freedman as Herself," will go on sale.

headline.main: 'Are You There God? It's Me, Margaret' and Other Judy Blume Favorites to Be Released as E-Books
headline.print_headline: Judy Blume Favorites Are to Be E-Books
